name: calfinated
description: Macro engine for token replacements in template strings

scripts.build: browserify --no-bundle-external -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] calfinated.js -r ./calfinated.js:calfinated -o browser/calfinated.js && browserify --no-bundle-external -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] calfinated.js -g uglifyify -r ./calfinated.js:calfinated -o browser/calfinated.min.js

author: Phillip Markert <pmarkert@ephisys.com>
